A Full Stack developer specializing in developing android applications. Experience building complete android applications with the backend API System.

OAuthSTIS:
OAuthSTIS

This library allows you to use services in STIS Statistics Polytechnic with an authentication system through a STIS Sipadu account.


Source Code
SIMPus:
SIMPus

a Library Management Information System owned by STIS Statistics Polytechnic. SIMPus was made to streamline book loans and to digitize all things in the STIS Statistics Polytechnic Library.

DSR_Archery:
DSR Archery

Application for scheduling, scoring and leaderboards. Created to manage member data at the archery club, complete with payment management.

help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
